original_text: Yes, I want to know Christ better and better. I want to know the power which God showed when Christ rose from death. I want to have the same kind of troubles that he did. I want to obey God like he did in his death.
korean_text: 내가 그리스도와 그 부활의 권능과 그 고난에 참여함을 알고자 하여 그의 죽으심을 본받아

sentences.original_text: Yes, I want to know Christ better and better.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 나는 그리스도를 더욱 더 잘 알고 싶습니다.

sentences.original_text: I want to know the power
which God showed when Christ rose from death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도가 죽음에서 부활하셨을 때 하나님이 보이신 능력을.

sentences.original_text: I want to have the same kind of troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 동일한 종류의 고난을 겪고 싶습니다.

sentences.original_text: like he did in his death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 죽으실 때와 같이 순종하고 싶습니다.
